channel.title: Avahai mDNS reflector setup
channel.description:
Instructions: Log onto your firewall Luci web interface and go to Network -> Firewall -> Traffic Rules tab. Under Open ports on router add a new rule for mDNS. This will be for UDP on port 5353
Question: When I look in this tab/section I am missing the "Open ports on router" section. Any advice on fixing this or possibly setting this up without the gui?
Source: https://blog.christophersmart.com/2020/03/30/resolving-mdns-across-vlans-with-avahi-on-openwrt/

So far stumbling through learning openwrt.
